name: Avoid Programs with Subqueries  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the programs having subqueries.
output:
This report lists RPG400 Programs with Subqueries.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Program full name
rationale: Having complex queries in  Programs can cause performance problems.
remediation: Try to reduce the complexity of queries or the number of complex queries
remediationSample:
Use join instead:

SELECT *
FROM HumanResources.Employee E
INNER JOIN HumanResources.EmployeeAddress EA ON E.EmployeeID = EA.EmployeeID
sample:
SELECT *
FROM HumanResources.Employee E
WHERE E.EmployeeID = ( SELECT EA.EmployeeID
FROM HumanResources.EmployeeAddress EA
WHERE EA.EmployeeID = E.EmployeeID)

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
